content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Line at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine-1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Iron gear inserter at (8.5, 11.5) facing RIGHT
- Iron gear chest at (9.5, 10.5) containing 10 iron gears
- Output inserter at (10.5, 13.5) facing RIGHT
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5) containing 1 copper plate

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing 252 coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5) with 29 coal as fuel

### Iron Production Line 1 at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Input chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) facing RIGHT with 17 coal as fuel
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0) with 11 coal as fuel
- Output inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) facing RIGHT with 18 coal as fuel
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing 2 iron plates

### Iron Production Line 2 at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Input chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) facing RIGHT with 41 coal as fuel
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0) with 18 coal as fuel
- Output inserter at (-13.5, -50.5) facing RIGHT with 42 coal as fuel
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing 44 iron plates

### Power Generation System
Consists of following entities:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) containing 200 water at 15°C
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting these components
- Electric pole network with multiple poles providing 14958V

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities near existing structures
- Check for existing entities (belts, chests, poles etc.) before placing new entities
- Increase spacing or change direction if initial placement fails
- Consider the full tile dimensions of larger entities like assembling machines and furnaces

### Errors with chest and inserter placement
- Ensure there is enough space around assembling machines for input/output infrastructure
- Plan the layout considering the space needed for chests, inserters and belts
- Verify the direction and spacing of inserters relative to source/target entities

### Resource extraction errors
- Verify the target furnace contains the required item before attempting extraction
- Check if the furnace is actually producing the desired material
- Ensure you are at the correct position to interact with the target entity

### Power and fluid system issues
- Steam engine shows no input liquid - ensure proper pipe connections
- Boiler needs fuel to heat water
- Verify electrical connections between power producers and consumers
